column4: I have a number of hard drives installed with ubuntu what are the
I have a number of hard drives installed with ubuntu what are the % chance of them booting without installing again??
i'll answer with a litte experience of mine, switched from  athlon 2000+ and msi sommethin 3 month ago, to asus p5ql intel core 2 duo 7200 + sata drives, no reinstall needed :)
